source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a static shot of a long, flooded hallway with white tiled walls. A large, yellow rubber duck is visible floating in the water at the far end of the hall. The scene then cuts to a close-up of the duck's face.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
